1016                                        geo.set_dense_geometry()
1017                                        kwargs.pop('tile')
1018                                    elif 'exploded' in maplabel:
1019                                        geo.set_exploded_geometry()
1020                                        kwargs.pop('tile')
1021                                    else:
1022                                        print('don\'t know ')
1023                                else:
1024                                    if any([len(i)==3 for i in geopdwd.codelocation.unique()]):
1025                                        geo.set_dense_geometry()
1026                                        kwargs.pop('tile')
1027                            else:
1028                                geo.set_main_geometry()
1029                                d = {}
1030                            new_geo = geo.get_data()[['name_'+self.granularity,'geometry']]
1031                            new_geo = new_geo.rename(columns={'name_'+self.granularity:'where'})
1032                            new_geo = new_geo.set_index('where')['geometry'].to_dict()
1033                            geopdwd['geometry'] = geopdwd['where'].map(new_geo)
1034                    geopdwd = gpd.GeoDataFrame(geopdwd, geometry=geopdwd.geometry, crs="EPSG:4326")
1035
1036            if func.__name__ == 'pycoa_histo':
1037                pos = {}
1038                new = pd.DataFrame()
1039                n = 0
1040                for i in uniqloc:
1041                    perloc = geopdwd.loc[geopdwd.clustername == i]
1042                    if all(perloc != 0):
1043                        pos = perloc.index[0]
1044                        if new.empty:
1045                            new = perloc
1046                        else:
1047                            new = pd.concat([new,perloc])
1048                        n += 1
1049                geopdwd = new.reset_index(drop=True)
1050            if cursor_date:
1051                date_slider = date_slider
1052            else:
1053                date_slider = None
1054            kwargs['date_slider'] = date_slider
1055            return func(self, geopdwd, input_field, **kwargs)
1056        return inner_hm

Decorator function used for histogram and map

@decowrapper
@decohistomap
def pycoa_histo(self, geopdwd, input_field=None, **kwargs): 
1059    @decowrapper
1060    @decohistomap
1061    def pycoa_histo(self,  geopdwd, input_field = None, **kwargs):
1062        '''
1063            -----------------
1064            Create 1D histogramme by value according to arguments.
1065            See help(pycoa_histo).
1066            Keyword arguments
1067            -----------------
1068            - geopdwd : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory
1069            |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
1070            - input_field = if None take second element could be a list
1071            - plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
1072            - plot_width = width_height_default[0]
1073            - title = None
1074            - textcopyright = default
1075            - when : default min and max according to the inpude DataFrame.
1076                     Dates are given under the format dd/mm/yyyy.
1077                     when format [dd/mm/yyyy : dd/mm/yyyy]
1078                     if [:dd/mm/yyyy] min date up to
1079                     if [dd/mm/yyyy:] up to max date
1080        '''
1081        geopdwd_filter = geopdwd.loc[geopdwd.date == self.when_end]
1082        geopdwd_filter = geopdwd_filter.reset_index(drop = True)
1083
1084        input = geopdwd_filter.rename(columns = {'cases': input_field})
1085        bins = kwargs.get('bins', None)
1086
1087        if 'where' in input.columns:
1088            uniqloc = list(input.clustername.unique())
1089            allval  = input.loc[input.clustername.isin(uniqloc)][['clustername', input_field,'permanentdisplay']]
1090            min_val = allval[input_field].min()
1091            max_val = allval[input_field].max()
1092
1093            if bins:
1094                bins = bins
1095            else:
1096                if len(uniqloc) == 1:
1097                    bins = 2
1098                    min_val = 0.
1099                else:
1100                    bins = 11
1101
1102            delta = (max_val - min_val ) / bins
1103            interval = [ min_val + i*delta for i in range(bins+1)]
1104
1105            contributors = {  i : [] for i in range(bins+1)}
1106            for i in range(len(allval)):
1107                rank = bisect.bisect_left(interval, allval.iloc[i][input_field])
1108                if rank == bins+1:
1109                    rank = bins
1110                contributors[rank].append(allval.iloc[i]['clustername'])
1111
1112            colors = itertools.cycle(self.lcolors)
1113            lcolors = [next(colors) for i in range(bins+1)]
1114            contributors = dict(sorted(contributors.items()))
1115            frame_histo = pd.DataFrame({
1116                              'left': [0]+interval[:-1],
1117                              'right':interval,
1118                              'middle_bin': [format((i+j)/2, ".1f") for i,j in zip([0]+interval[:-1],interval)],
1119                              'top': [len(i) for i in list(contributors.values())],
1120                              'contributors': [', '.join(i) for i in contributors.values()],
1121                              'colors': lcolors})
1122        #tooltips = """
1123        #<div style="width: 400px">
1124        #<b>Middle value:</b> @middle_bin <br>
1125        #<b>Contributors:</b> @contributors{safe} <br>
1126        #</div>
1127        #"""
1128        tooltips = """
1129        <b>Middle value:</b> @middle_bin <br>
1130        <b>Contributors:</b> @contributors{safe} <br>
1131        """
1132        hover_tool = HoverTool(tooltips = tooltips)
1133        panels = []
1134        bottom = 0
1135        x_axis_type, y_axis_type, axis_type_title = 3 * ['linear']
1136        for axis_type in ["linear", "linlog", "loglin", "loglog"]:
1137            if axis_type == 'linlog':
1138                y_axis_type, axis_type_title = 'log', 'logy'
1139            if axis_type == 'loglin':
1140                x_axis_type, y_axis_type, axis_type_title = 'log', 'linear', 'logx'
1141            if axis_type == 'loglog':
1142                x_axis_type, y_axis_type = 'log', 'log'
1143                axis_type_title = 'loglog'
1144
1145            standardfig = self.standardfig(x_axis_type=x_axis_type, y_axis_type=y_axis_type, **kwargs)
1146
1147            standardfig.yaxis[0].formatter = PrintfTickFormatter(format = "%4.2e")
1148            standardfig.xaxis[0].formatter = PrintfTickFormatter(format="%4.2e")
1149            standardfig.add_tools(hover_tool)
1150            standardfig.x_range = Range1d(1.05 * interval[0], 1.05 * interval[-1])
1151            standardfig.y_range = Range1d(0, 1.05 * frame_histo['top'].max())
1152            if x_axis_type == "log":
1153                left = 0.8
1154                if frame_histo['left'][0] <= 0:
1155                    frame_histo.at[0, 'left'] = left
1156                else:
1157                    left  = frame_histo['left'][0]
1158                standardfig.x_range = Range1d(left, 10 * interval[-1])
1159
1160            if y_axis_type == "log":
1161                bottom = 0.0001
1162                standardfig.y_range = Range1d(0.001, 10 * frame_histo['top'].max())
1163
1164            standardfig.quad(source=ColumnDataSource(frame_histo), top='top', bottom=bottom, left='left', \
1165                             right='right', fill_color='colors')
1166            panel = Panel(child=standardfig, title=axis_type_title)
1167            panels.append(panel)
1168        tabs = Tabs(tabs=panels)
1169        return tabs

Create 1D histogramme by value according to arguments. See help(pycoa_histo).

Keyword arguments

  • geopdwd : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
  • input_field = if None take second element could be a list
  • plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
  • plot_width = width_height_default[0]
  • title = None
  • textcopyright = default
  • when : default min and max according to the inpude DataFrame. Dates are given under the format dd/mm/yyyy. when format [dd/mm/yyyy : dd/mm/yyyy] if [:dd/mm/yyyy] min date up to if [dd/mm/yyyy:] up to max date
def decohistopie(func): 
1172    def decohistopie(func):
1173        @wraps(func)
1174        def inner_decohistopie(self, geopdwd, input_field, **kwargs):
1175            """
1176            Decorator for
1177            Horizontal histogram & Pie Chart
1178            """
1179            geopdwd['cases'] = geopdwd[input_field]
1180            maplabel = kwargs.get('maplabel',None)
1181            plot_width = kwargs.get('plot_width',self.dfigure_default['plot_width'])
1182            plot_height = kwargs.get('plot_height',self.dfigure_default['plot_height'])
1183
1184            geopdwd_filter = geopdwd.loc[geopdwd.date == self.when_end]
1185            geopdwd_filter = geopdwd_filter.reset_index(drop = True)
1186            geopdwd_filter['cases'] = geopdwd_filter[input_field]
1187            cursor_date = kwargs.get('cursor_date',self.dvisu_default['cursor_date'])
1188            date_slider = kwargs['date_slider']
1189            my_date = geopdwd.date.unique()
1190            dico_utc = {i: DateSlider(value=i).value for i in my_date}
1191            geopdwd['date_utc'] = [dico_utc[i] for i in geopdwd.date]
1192            #geopdwd = geopdwd.drop_duplicates(["date", "codelocation","clustername"])#for sumall avoid duplicate
1193            #geopdwd_filter = geopdwd_filter.drop_duplicates(["date", "codelocation","clustername"])
1194            geopdwd = geopdwd.drop_duplicates(["date","clustername"])#for sumall avoid duplicate
1195            geopdwd_filter = geopdwd_filter.drop_duplicates(["date","clustername"])
1196            locunique = geopdwd_filter.clustername.unique()#geopdwd_filtered['where'].unique()
1197            geopdwd_filter = geopdwd_filter.copy()
1198            nmaxdisplayed = MAXCOUNTRIESDISPLAYED
1199            toggl = None
1200
1201            if len(locunique) >= nmaxdisplayed :#and func.__name__ != 'pycoa_pie' :
1202                if func.__name__ != 'pycoa_pie' :
1203                    geopdwd_filter = geopdwd_filter.loc[geopdwd_filter.clustername.isin(locunique[:nmaxdisplayed])]
1204                else:
1205                    geopdwd_filter_first = geopdwd_filter.loc[geopdwd_filter.clustername.isin(locunique[:nmaxdisplayed-1])]
1206                    geopdwd_filter_other = geopdwd_filter.loc[geopdwd_filter.clustername.isin(locunique[nmaxdisplayed-1:])]
1207                    geopdwd_filter_other = geopdwd_filter_other.groupby('date').sum()
1208                    geopdwd_filter_other['where'] = 'others'
1209                    geopdwd_filter_other['clustername'] = 'others'
1210                    geopdwd_filter_other['codelocation'] = 'others'
1211                    geopdwd_filter_other['permanentdisplay'] = 'others'
1212                    geopdwd_filter_other['rolloverdisplay'] = 'others'
1213                    geopdwd_filter_other['colors'] = '#FFFFFF'
1214
1215                    geopdwd_filter = geopdwd_filter_first
1216                    geopdwd_filter = pd.concat([geopdwd_filter,geopdwd_filter_other])
1217            if func.__name__ == 'pycoa_horizonhisto' :
1218                #geopdwd_filter['bottom'] = geopdwd_filter.index
1219                geopdwd_filter['left'] = geopdwd_filter['cases']
1220                geopdwd_filter['right'] = geopdwd_filter['cases']
1221                geopdwd_filter['left'] = geopdwd_filter['left'].apply(lambda x: 0 if x > 0 else x)
1222                geopdwd_filter['right'] = geopdwd_filter['right'].apply(lambda x: 0 if x < 0 else x)
1223
1224                n = len(geopdwd_filter.index)
1225                d =  plot_height / n
1226                ymax = plot_height
1227
1228                geopdwd_filter['top'] = [ymax*(n-i)/n + d/2   for i in range(n)]
1229                geopdwd_filter['bottom'] = [ymax*(n-i)/n - d/2 for i in range(n)]
1230                geopdwd_filter['horihistotexty'] = geopdwd_filter['bottom'] + d/2
1231                geopdwd_filter['horihistotextx'] = geopdwd_filter['right']
1232                if maplabel and 'label%' in maplabel:
1233                    geopdwd_filter['right'] = geopdwd_filter['right'].apply(lambda x: 100.*x)
1234                    geopdwd_filter['horihistotextx'] = geopdwd_filter['right']
1235                    geopdwd_filter['horihistotext'] = [str(round(i))+'%' for i in geopdwd_filter['right']]
1236                if maplabel and 'textinteger' in maplabel:
1237                    geopdwd_filter['horihistotext'] = geopdwd_filter['right'].astype(float).astype(int).astype(str)
1238                else:
1239                    geopdwd_filter['horihistotext'] = [ '{:.3g}'.format(float(i)) if float(i)>1.e4 or float(i)<0.01 else round(float(i),2) for i in geopdwd_filter['right'] ]
1240                    geopdwd_filter['horihistotext'] = [str(i) for i in geopdwd_filter['horihistotext']]
1241            if func.__name__ == 'pycoa_pie' :
1242                geopdwd_filter = self.add_columns_for_pie_chart(geopdwd_filter,input_field)
1243                geopdwd = self.add_columns_for_pie_chart(geopdwd,input_field)
1244                if maplabel and 'label%' in maplabel:
1245                    geopdwd_filter['textdisplayed2'] = geopdwd_filter['percentage']
1246                    geopdwd['textdisplayed2'] =  geopdwd['percentage']
1247
1248            source = ColumnDataSource(data = geopdwd)
1249            input_filter = geopdwd_filter
1250            srcfiltered = ColumnDataSource(data = input_filter)
1251            max_value = max(input_filter['cases'])
1252            min_value = min(input_filter['cases'])
1253            min_value_gt0 = min(input_filter[input_filter['cases'] >= 0]['cases'])
1254            panels = []
1255            for axis_type in self.ax_type:
1256                plot_width = kwargs['plot_width']
1257                plot_height = kwargs['plot_height']
1258                standardfig = self.standardfig( x_axis_type = axis_type,  x_range = (1.05*min_value, 1.05 * max_value),**kwargs)
1259                if maplabel and 'label%' in maplabel:
1260                    standardfig.x_range = Range1d(0.01, 1.2 * max_value*100)
1261                    standardfig.xaxis.axis_label = 'percentage(%)'
1262                    standardfig.xaxis.formatter = BasicTickFormatter(use_scientific=False)
1263                else:
1264                    standardfig.xaxis[0].formatter = PrintfTickFormatter(format="%4.2e")
1265                    standardfig.x_range = Range1d(max_value/100., 1.2 * max_value)
1266                if not input_filter[input_filter[input_field] < 0.].empty:
1267                    standardfig.x_range = Range1d(1.2 * min_value, 1.2 * max_value)
1268
1269                if axis_type == "log":
1270                    if not input_filter[input_filter[input_field] < 0.].empty:
1271                        print('Some value are negative, can\'t display log scale in this context')
1272                    else:
1273                        if func.__name__ == 'pycoa_horizonhisto' :
1274                            if maplabel and 'label%' in maplabel:
1275                                standardfig.x_range = Range1d(0.01, 50 * max_value*100)
1276                            else:
1277                                standardfig.x_range = Range1d(max_value/100., 50 * max_value)
1278
1279                            srcfiltered.data['left'] = [min(srcfiltered.data['right'])/100.] * len(srcfiltered.data['right'])
1280
1281                if func.__name__ == 'pycoa_pie':
1282                    if not input_filter[input_filter[input_field] < 0.].empty:
1283                        raise CoaKeyError('Some values are negative, can\'t display a Pie chart, try histo by location')
1284                    standardfig.plot_width = plot_height
1285                    standardfig.plot_height = plot_height
1286
1287                if date_slider:
1288                    date_slider.width = int(0.8*plot_width)
1289                    callback = CustomJS(args = dict(source = source,
1290                                                  source_filter = srcfiltered,
1291                                                  date_slider = date_slider,
1292                                                  ylabel = standardfig.yaxis[0],
1293                                                  title = standardfig.title,
1294                                                  x_range = standardfig.x_range,
1295                                                  x_axis_type = axis_type,
1296                                                  figure = standardfig),
1297                            code = """
1298                            var date_slide = date_slider.value;
1299                            var dates = source.data['date_utc'];
1300                            var val = source.data['cases'];
1301                            var loc = source.data['clustername'];
1302                            //var loc = source.data['where'];
1303                            var subregion = source.data['name_subregion'];
1304                            var codeloc = source.data['codelocation'];
1305                            var colors = source.data['colors'];
1306                            var colors = source.data['colors'];
1307
1308                            var newval = [];
1309                            var newloc = [];
1310                            var newcolors = [];
1311                            var newcodeloc = [];
1312                            var newname_subregion = [];
1313                            var labeldic = {};
1314                            for (var i = 0; i < dates.length; i++){
1315                            if (dates[i] == date_slide){
1316                                newval.push(parseFloat(val[i]));
1317                                newloc.push(loc[i]);
1318                                newcodeloc.push(codeloc[i]);
1319                                newcolors.push(colors[i]);
1320                                if(typeof subregion !== 'undefined')
1321                                    newname_subregion.push(subregion[i]);
1322
1323                                }
1324                            }
1325                            var len = source_filter.data['clustername'].length;
1326
1327                            var indices = new Array(len);
1328                            for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) indices[i] = i;
1329
1330                            indices.sort(function (a, b) { return newval[a] > newval[b] ? -1 : newval[a] < newval[b] ? 1 : 0; });
1331                            var orderval = [];
1332                            var orderloc = [];
1333                            var ordercodeloc = [];
1334                            var ordername_subregion = [];
1335                            var ordercolors = [];
1336                            var textdisplayed = [];
1337                            for (var i = 0; i < len; i++)
1338                            {
1339                                orderval.push(newval[indices[i]]);
1340                                orderloc.push(newloc[indices[i]]);
1341                                ordercodeloc.push(newcodeloc[indices[i]]);
1342
1343                                if(typeof subregion !== 'undefined')
1344                                    ordername_subregion.push(newname_subregion[i]);
1345                                ordercolors.push(newcolors[indices[i]]);
1346                                //labeldic[len-indices[i]] = newcodeloc[indices[i]];
1347                                textdisplayed.push(newcodeloc[indices[i]].padStart(40,' '));
1348                            }
1349
1350
1351                            source_filter.data['cases'] = orderval;
1352                            const reducer = (accumulator, currentValue) => accumulator + currentValue;
1353                            var tot = orderval.reduce(reducer);
1354                            var top = [];
1355                            var bottom = [];
1356                            var starts = [];
1357                            var ends = [];
1358                            var middle = [];
1359                            var text_x = [];
1360                            var text_y = [];
1361                            var r = 0.7;
1362                            var bthick = 0.95;
1363                            var cumul = 0.;
1364                            var percentage = [];
1365                            var angle = [];
1366                            var text_size = [];
1367                            var left_quad = [];
1368                            var right_quad = [];
1369
1370                            for(var i = 0; i < orderval.length; i++)
1371                            {
1372                                cumul += ((orderval[i] / tot) * 2 * Math.PI);
1373                                ends.push(cumul);
1374                                if(i==0)
1375                                    starts.push(0);
1376                                else
1377                                    starts.push(ends[i-1]);
1378                                middle.push((ends[i]+starts[i])/2);
1379                                text_x.push(r*Math.cos(middle[i]));
1380                                text_y.push(r*Math.sin(middle[i]));
1381                                percentage.push(String(100.*orderval[i] / tot).slice(0, 4));
1382                                angle.push((orderval[i] / tot) * 2 * Math.PI)
1383                                /*if ((ends[i]-starts[i]) > 0.08*(2 * Math.PI))
1384                                    text_size.push('10pt');
1385                                else
1386                                    text_size.push('6pt');*/
1387
1388                                //top.push((orderval.length-i) + bthick/2);
1389                                //bottom.push((orderval.length-i) - bthick/2);
1390
1391                                if (isNaN(orderval[i])) orderval[i] = 0.;
1392                                if(orderval[i]<=0.)
1393                                {
1394                                    left_quad.push(orderval[i]);
1395                                    right_quad.push(0.);
1396                                }
1397                                else
1398                                {
1399                                    left_quad.push(0);
1400                                    right_quad.push(orderval[i]);
1401                                }
1402                            }
1403
1404                            source_filter.data['clustername'] = orderloc;
1405                            source_filter.data['codelocation'] = ordercodeloc;
1406                            source_filter.data['colors'] = ordercolors;
1407
1408                            if(typeof subregion !== 'undefined')
1409                                source_filter.data['rolloverdisplay'] = ordername_subregion;
1410                            else
1411                                source_filter.data['rolloverdisplay'] = orderloc;
1412
1413                            source_filter.data['ends'] = ends;
1414                            source_filter.data['starts'] = starts;
1415                            source_filter.data['middle'] = middle;
1416                            source_filter.data['text_x'] = text_x;
1417                            source_filter.data['text_y'] = text_y;
1418                            //source_filter.data['text_size'] = text_size;
1419                            source_filter.data['percentage'] = percentage;
1420                            source_filter.data['angle'] = angle;
1421
1422
1423                            source_filter.data['left'] = left_quad;
1424                            source_filter.data['right'] = right_quad;
1425
1426                            var mid =[];
1427                            var ht = [];
1428                            var textdisplayed2 = [];
1429
1430                            var n = right_quad.length;
1431                            var d = figure.plot_height / n;
1432                            var ymax = figure.plot_height;
1433
1434                            for(i=0; i<right_quad.length;i++){
1435                                top.push(parseInt(ymax*(n-i)/n+d/2));
1436                                bottom.push(parseInt(ymax*(n-i)/n-d/2));
1437                                mid.push(parseInt(ymax*(n-i)/n));
1438                                labeldic[parseInt(ymax*(n-i)/n)] = orderloc[i];//ordercodeloc[i];
1439
1440                                ht.push(right_quad[i].toFixed(2).toString());
1441                                var a=new Intl.NumberFormat().format(right_quad[i])
1442                                textdisplayed2.push(a.toString().padStart(26,' '));
1443                                //textdisplayed2.push(right_quad[i].toFixed(2).toString().padStart(40,' '));
1444
1445                            }
1446                            source_filter.data['top'] = top;
1447                            source_filter.data['bottom'] = bottom;
1448
1449                            source_filter.data['horihistotextxy'] =  mid;
1450                            source_filter.data['horihistotextx'] =  right_quad;
1451                            source_filter.data['horihistotext'] =  ht;
1452                            source_filter.data['permanentdisplay'] = orderloc;//ordercodeloc;
1453                            source_filter.data['textdisplayed'] = textdisplayed;
1454                            source_filter.data['textdisplayed2'] = textdisplayed2;
1455                            var maxx = Math.max.apply(Math, right_quad);
1456                            var minx = Math.min.apply(Math, left_quad);
1457
1458                            ylabel.major_label_overrides = labeldic;
1459                            x_range.end =  1.2 * maxx;
1460                            x_range.start =  1.05 * minx;
1461                            if(minx >= 0){
1462                                x_range.start =  0.01;
1463                                source_filter.data['left'] = Array(left_quad.length).fill(0.01);
1464                                }
1465                            var tmp = title.text;
1466                            tmp = tmp.slice(0, -11);
1467                            var dateconverted = new Date(date_slide);
1468                            var dd = String(dateconverted.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
1469                            var mm = String(dateconverted.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); //January is 0!
1470                            var yyyy = dateconverted.getFullYear();
1471                            var dmy = dd + '/' + mm + '/' + yyyy;
1472                            //title.text = tmp + dmy+")";
1473
1474                            source_filter.change.emit();
1475                        """)
1476                    date_slider.js_on_change('value', callback)
1477                    # Set up Play/Pause button/toggle JS
1478                    date_list = pd.date_range(geopdwd.date.min(),geopdwd.date.max()-dt.timedelta(days=1),freq='d').to_list()
1479                    indexCDS = ColumnDataSource(dict(date=date_list))
1480                    toggl_js = CustomJS(args=dict(date_slider=date_slider,indexCDS=indexCDS),code="""
1481                    // A little lengthy but it works for me, for this problem, in this version.
1482                        var check_and_iterate = function(date){
1483                            var slider_val = date_slider.value;
1484                            var toggle_val = cb_obj.active;
1485                            if(toggle_val == false) {
1486                                cb_obj.label = '► Play';
1487                                clearInterval(looop);
1488                                }
1489                            else if(slider_val == date[date.length - 1]) {
1490                                cb_obj.label = '► Play';
1491                                //date_slider.value = date[0];
1492                                cb_obj.active = false;
1493                                clearInterval(looop);
1494                                }
1495                            else if(slider_val !== date[date.length - 1]){
1496                                date_slider.value = date.filter((item) => item > slider_val)[0];
1497                                }
1498                            else {
1499                            clearInterval(looop);
1500                                }
1501                        }
1502                        if(cb_obj.active == false){
1503                            cb_obj.label = '► Play';
1504                            clearInterval(looop);
1505                        }
1506                        else {
1507                            cb_obj.label = '❚❚ Pause';
1508                            var looop = setInterval(check_and_iterate, 10, indexCDS.data['date']);
1509                        };
1510                    """)
1511
1512                    toggl = Toggle(label='► Play',active=False, button_type="success",height=30,width=10)
1513                    toggl.js_on_change('active',toggl_js)
1514
1515                cases_custom = CocoDisplay.rollerJS()
1516
1517                if min(srcfiltered.data['cases'])<0.01:
1518                    tooltips=[('where', '@rolloverdisplay'), (input_field, '@cases'), ]
1519                else:
1520                    tooltips=[('where', '@rolloverdisplay'), (input_field, '@cases{0,0.0}'), ],
1521                if isinstance(tooltips,tuple):
1522                    tooltips = tooltips[0]
1523                if func.__name__ == 'pycoa_pie' :
1524                    standardfig.add_tools(HoverTool(
1525                        tooltips = tooltips,
1526                        formatters = {'where': 'printf', '@{' + 'cases' + '}': cases_custom, '%':'printf'},
1527                        point_policy = "snap_to_data"))  # ,PanTool())
1528                else:
1529                    standardfig.add_tools(HoverTool(
1530                        tooltips = tooltips,
1531                        formatters = {'where': 'printf', '@{' + 'cases' + '}': cases_custom, },
1532                        point_policy = "snap_to_data"))  # ,PanTool())
1533                panel = Panel(child = standardfig, title = axis_type)
1534                panels.append(panel)
1535
1536            return func(self, srcfiltered, panels, date_slider, toggl)
1537        return inner_decohistopie
@decowrapper
@decohistomap
@decohistopie
def pycoa_horizonhisto(self, srcfiltered, panels, date_slider, toggl): 
1540    @decowrapper
1541    @decohistomap
1542    @decohistopie
1543    def pycoa_horizonhisto(self, srcfiltered, panels, date_slider,toggl):
1544        '''
1545            -----------------
1546            Create 1D histogramme by location according to arguments.
1547            See help(pycoa_histo).
1548            Keyword arguments
1549            -----------------
1550            - srcfiltered : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory
1551            |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
1552            - input_field = if None take second element could be a list
1553            - plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
1554            - plot_width = width_height_default[0]
1555            - title = None
1556            - textcopyright = default
1557            - mode = mouse
1558            - cursor_date = None if True
1559                    - orientation = horizontal
1560            - when : default min and max according to the inpude DataFrame.
1561                         Dates are given under the format dd/mm/yyyy.
1562                         when format [dd/mm/yyyy : dd/mm/yyyy]
1563                         if [:dd/mm/yyyy] min date up to
1564                         if [dd/mm/yyyy:] up to max date
1565        '''
1566        n = len(panels)
1567        new_panels = []
1568        for i in range(n):
1569            fig = panels[i].child
1570            fig.y_range = Range1d(min(srcfiltered.data['bottom']), max(srcfiltered.data['top']))
1571            fig.yaxis[0].formatter = NumeralTickFormatter(format="0.0")
1572            ytick_loc = [int(i) for i in srcfiltered.data['horihistotexty']]
1573            fig.yaxis.ticker  = ytick_loc
1574            label_dict = dict(zip(ytick_loc,srcfiltered.data['permanentdisplay']))
1575            fig.yaxis.major_label_overrides = label_dict
1576
1577            #print(fig.y_range ,fig.yaxis.major_label_overrides)
1578            fig.quad(source = srcfiltered,
1579                top='top', bottom = 'bottom', left = 'left', right = 'right', color = 'colors', line_color = 'black',
1580                line_width = 1, hover_line_width = 2)
1581
1582            labels = LabelSet(
1583                    x = 'horihistotextx',
1584                    y = 'horihistotexty',
1585                    x_offset=5,
1586                    y_offset=-4,
1587                    text = 'horihistotext',
1588                    source = srcfiltered,text_font_size='10px',text_color='black')
1589            fig.add_layout(labels)
1590
1591            panel = Panel(child = fig, title = panels[i].title)
1592            new_panels.append(panel)
1593        tabs = Tabs(tabs = new_panels)
1594        if date_slider:
1595                tabs = column(date_slider,tabs,toggl)
1596        return tabs

Create 1D histogramme by location according to arguments. See help(pycoa_histo).

Keyword arguments

  • srcfiltered : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
  • input_field = if None take second element could be a list
  • plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
  • plot_width = width_height_default[0]
  • title = None
  • textcopyright = default
  • mode = mouse
  • cursor_date = None if True
    • orientation = horizontal
  • when : default min and max according to the inpude DataFrame. Dates are given under the format dd/mm/yyyy. when format [dd/mm/yyyy : dd/mm/yyyy] if [:dd/mm/yyyy] min date up to if [dd/mm/yyyy:] up to max date
def add_columns_for_pie_chart(self, df, column_name): 
1599    def add_columns_for_pie_chart(self,df,column_name):
1600        df = df.copy()
1601        column_sum = df[column_name].sum()
1602        df['percentage'] = df[column_name]/column_sum
1603        percentages = [0]  + df['percentage'].cumsum().tolist()
1604        df['angle'] = (df[column_name]/column_sum)*2 * np.pi
1605        df['starts'] = [p * 2 * np.pi for p in percentages[:-1]]
1606        df['ends'] = [p * 2 * np.pi for p in percentages[1:]]
1607        df['diff'] = (df['ends'] - df['starts'])
1608        df['middle'] = df['starts']+np.abs(df['ends']-df['starts'])/2.
1609        df['cos'] = np.cos(df['middle']) * 0.9
1610        df['sin'] = np.sin(df['middle']) * 0.9
1611
1612        df['text_size'] = '8pt'
1613        df['textdisplayed'] = df['permanentdisplay'].str.pad(36, side = "left")
1614        try:
1615            locale.setlocale(locale.LC_ALL, 'en_US')
1616        except:
1617            try:
1618                locale.setlocale(locale.LC_ALL, 'en_US.utf8')
1619            except:
1620                raise CoaError("Locale setting problem. Please contact support@pycoa.fr")
1621
1622        df['textdisplayed2'] = [ locale.format("%d", i, grouping=True)\
1623                for i in df[column_name]]
1624        #df['textdisplayed2'] = df[column_name].astype(str) #[i.str for i in df[column_name]]
1625        df['textdisplayed2'] = df['textdisplayed2'].str.pad(26, side = "left")
1626        #df['textdisplayed2']  = df[column_name].str.pad(26, side = "left")
1627        df.loc[df['diff'] <= np.pi/20,'textdisplayed']=''
1628        df.loc[df['diff'] <= np.pi/20,'textdisplayed2']=''
1629        df['percentage'] = 100.*df['percentage']
1630        return df
@decowrapper
@decohistomap
@decohistopie
def pycoa_pie(self, srcfiltered, panels, date_slider, toggl): 
1632    @decowrapper
1633    @decohistomap
1634    @decohistopie
1635    def pycoa_pie(self, srcfiltered, panels, date_slider,toggl):
1636        '''
1637            -----------------
1638            Create a pie chart according to arguments.
1639            See help(pycoa_pie).
1640            Keyword arguments
1641            -----------------
1642            - srcfiltered : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory
1643            |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
1644            - input_field = if None take second element could be a list
1645            - plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
1646            - plot_width = width_height_default[0]
1647            - title = None
1648            - textcopyright = default
1649            - mode = mouse
1650            - cursor_date = None if True
1651                    - orientation = horizontal
1652        '''
1653        standardfig = panels[0].child
1654        standardfig.plot_height=400
1655        standardfig.plot_width=400
1656        standardfig.x_range = Range1d(-1.1, 1.1)
1657        standardfig.y_range = Range1d(-1.1, 1.1)
1658        standardfig.axis.visible = False
1659        standardfig.xgrid.grid_line_color = None
1660        standardfig.ygrid.grid_line_color = None
1661
1662        standardfig.wedge(x=0, y=0, radius=1.,line_color='#E8E8E8',
1663        start_angle=cumsum('angle', include_zero=True), end_angle=cumsum('angle'),
1664        fill_color='colors', legend_label='clustername', source=srcfiltered)
1665        standardfig.legend.visible = False
1666
1667        labels = LabelSet(x=0, y=0,text='textdisplayed',angle=cumsum('angle', include_zero=True),
1668        text_font_size="10pt",source=srcfiltered,render_mode='canvas')
1669
1670        labels2 = LabelSet(x=0, y=0, text='textdisplayed2',
1671        angle=cumsum('angle', include_zero=True),text_font_size="8pt",source=srcfiltered)
1672
1673        standardfig.add_layout(labels)
1674        standardfig.add_layout(labels2)
1675        if date_slider:
1676            standardfig = column(date_slider,standardfig)
1677        return standardfig

Create a pie chart according to arguments. See help(pycoa_pie).

Keyword arguments

  • srcfiltered : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
  • input_field = if None take second element could be a list
  • plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
  • plot_width = width_height_default[0]
  • title = None
  • textcopyright = default
  • mode = mouse
  • cursor_date = None if True
    • orientation = horizontal
@decowrapper
@decohistomap
def pycoa_mapfolium(self, geopdwd, input_field, **kwargs): 
1680    @decowrapper
1681    @decohistomap
1682    def pycoa_mapfolium(self, geopdwd, input_field, **kwargs):
1683        '''
1684            -----------------
1685            Create a map folium to arguments.
1686            See help(pycoa_histo).
1687            Keyword arguments
1688            -----------------
1689            - srcfiltered : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory
1690            |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
1691            - input_field = if None take second element could be a list
1692            - plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
1693            - plot_width = width_height_default[0]
1694            - title = None
1695            - textcopyright = default
1696            - mode = mouse
1697            - cursor_date = None if True
1698                    - orientation = horizontal
1699            - when : default min and max according to the inpude DataFrame.
1700                         Dates are given under the format dd/mm/yyyy.
1701                         when format [dd/mm/yyyy : dd/mm/yyyy]
1702                         if [:dd/mm/yyyy] min date up to
1703                         if [dd/mm/yyyy:] up to max date
1704        '''
1705        title = kwargs.get('title', None)
1706        tile =  kwargs.get('tile', self.dvisu_default['tile'])
1707        tile = CocoDisplay.convert_tile(tile, 'folium')
1708        maplabel = kwargs.get('maplabel',self.dvisu_default['maplabel'])
1709        plot_width = kwargs.get('plot_width',self.dfigure_default['plot_width'])
1710        plot_height = kwargs.get('plot_height',self.dfigure_default['plot_height'])
1711
1712        geopdwd['cases'] = geopdwd[input_field]
1713        geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd.loc[geopdwd.date == self.when_end]
1714        geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.reset_index(drop = True)
1715        geopdwd_filtered['cases'] = geopdwd_filtered[input_field]
1716        my_date = geopdwd.date.unique()
1717        dico_utc = {i: DateSlider(value=i).value for i in my_date}
1718        geopdwd['date_utc'] = [dico_utc[i] for i in geopdwd.date]
1719        #geopdwd = geopdwd.drop_duplicates(["date", "codelocation","clustername"])#for sumall avoid duplicate
1720        #geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.sort_values(by='cases', ascending = False).reset_index()
1721        #locunique = geopdwd_filtered.clustername.unique()#geopdwd_filtered['where'].unique()
1722        if self.database_name == 'risklayer':
1723            geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.loc[geopdwd_filtered.geometry.notna()]
1724
1725        uniqloc = list(geopdwd_filtered.codelocation.unique())
1726        geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.drop(columns=['date', 'colors'])
1727
1728        msg = "(data from: {})".format(self.database_name)
1729
1730        minx, miny, maxx, maxy =  geopdwd_filtered.total_bounds
1731
1732        mapa = folium.Map(tiles=tile, attr='<a href=\"http://pycoa.fr\"> ©pycoa.fr </a>' + msg)
1733        #min_lat=minx, max_lat=maxx, min_lon=miny, max_lon=maxy)
1734        #location=[geopdwd_filtered.centroid.y.mean(),geopdwd_filtered.centroid.x.mean()],)
1735        if self.dbld[self.database_name][0] != 'WW':
1736            mapa.fit_bounds([(miny, minx), (maxy, maxx)])
1737
1738        fig = Figure(width=plot_width, height=plot_height)
1739        fig.add_child(mapa)
1740        min_col, max_col = CocoDisplay.min_max_range(np.nanmin(geopdwd_filtered[input_field]),
1741                                                     np.nanmax(geopdwd_filtered[input_field]))
1742        min_col_non0 = (np.nanmin(geopdwd_filtered.loc[geopdwd_filtered['cases']>0.]['cases']))
1743
1744        invViridis256 = Viridis256[::-1]
1745        if maplabel and 'log' in maplabel:
1746            geopdwd_filtered['cases'] = geopdwd_filtered.loc[geopdwd_filtered['cases']>0]['cases']
1747            color_mapper = LinearColorMapper(palette=invViridis256, low=min_col_non0, high=max_col, nan_color='#d9d9d9')
1748            colormap =  branca.colormap.LinearColormap(color_mapper.palette).to_step(data=list(geopdwd_filtered['cases']),n=10,method='log')
1749        else:
1750            color_mapper = LinearColorMapper(palette=invViridis256, low=min_col, high=max_col, nan_color='#d9d9d9')
1751            colormap = branca.colormap.LinearColormap(color_mapper.palette).scale(min_col, max_col)
1752        colormap.caption =  title
1753        colormap.add_to(mapa)
1754        map_id = colormap.get_name()
1755
1756        custom_label_colorbar_js = """
1757        var div = document.getElementById('legend');
1758        var ticks = document.getElementsByClassName('tick')
1759        for(var i = 0; i < ticks.length; i++){
1760        var values = ticks[i].textContent.replace(',','')
1761        val = parseFloat(values).toExponential(1).toString().replace("+", "")
1762        if(parseFloat(ticks[i].textContent) == 0) val = 0.
1763        div.innerHTML = div.innerHTML.replace(ticks[i].textContent,val);
1764        }
1765        """
1766        e = Element(custom_label_colorbar_js)
1767        html = colormap.get_root()
1768        html.script.get_root().render()
1769        html.script._children[e.get_name()] = e
1770        geopdwd_filtered[input_field + 'scientific_format'] = \
1771            (['{:.5g}'.format(i) for i in geopdwd_filtered['cases']])
1772        # (['{:.3g}'.format(i) if i>100000 else i for i in geopdwd_filter[input_field]])
1773
1774        map_dict = geopdwd_filtered.set_index('where')[input_field].to_dict()
1775        if np.nanmin(geopdwd_filtered[input_field]) == np.nanmax(geopdwd_filtered[input_field]):
1776            map_dict['FakeCountry'] = 0.
1777
1778        if maplabel and 'log' in maplabel:
1779            color_scale =  branca.colormap.LinearColormap(color_mapper.palette).to_step(data=list(geopdwd_filtered['cases']),n=10,method='log')
1780        else:
1781            color_scale = LinearColormap(color_mapper.palette, vmin=min(map_dict.values()), vmax=max(map_dict.values()))
1782
1783        def get_color(feature):
1784            value = map_dict.get(feature['properties']['where'])
1785            if value is None or np.isnan(value):
1786                return '#8c8c8c'  # MISSING -> gray
1787            else:
1788                return color_scale(value)
1789
1790        displayed = 'rolloverdisplay'
1791        folium.GeoJson(
1792            geopdwd_filtered,
1793            style_function=lambda x:
1794            {
1795                'fillColor': get_color(x),
1796                'fillOpacity': 0.8,
1797                'color': None
1798            },
1799            highlight_function=lambda x: {'weight': 2, 'color': 'green'},
1800            tooltip=folium.features.GeoJsonTooltip(fields=[displayed, input_field + 'scientific_format'],
1801                                                   aliases=['where' + ':', input_field + ":"],
1802                                                   style="""
1803                        background-color: #F0EFEF;
1804                        border: 2px solid black;
1805                        border-radius: 3px;
1806                        box-shadow: 3px;
1807                        opacity: 0.2;
1808                        """),
1809            # '<div style="barialckground-color: royalblue 0.2; color: black; padding: 2px; border: 1px solid black; border-radius: 2px;">'+input_field+'</div>'])
1810        ).add_to(mapa)
1811        return mapa

Create a map folium to arguments. See help(pycoa_histo).

Keyword arguments

  • srcfiltered : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
  • input_field = if None take second element could be a list
  • plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
  • plot_width = width_height_default[0]
  • title = None
  • textcopyright = default
  • mode = mouse
  • cursor_date = None if True
    • orientation = horizontal
  • when : default min and max according to the inpude DataFrame. Dates are given under the format dd/mm/yyyy. when format [dd/mm/yyyy : dd/mm/yyyy] if [:dd/mm/yyyy] min date up to if [dd/mm/yyyy:] up to max date
def decopycoageo(func): 
1814    def decopycoageo(func):
1815        @wraps(func)
1816        def innerdecopycoageo(self, geopdwd, input_field, **kwargs):
1817            geopdwd['cases'] = geopdwd[input_field]
1818            if self.pycoageopandas:
1819                loc=geopdwd['where'].unique()
1820                locgeo=geopdwd.loc[geopdwd['where'].isin(loc)].drop_duplicates('where').set_index('where')['geometry']
1821                geopdwd=fill_missing_dates(geopdwd)
1822                geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd.loc[geopdwd.date == self.when_end]
1823                geopdwd_filtered_cp = geopdwd_filtered.copy()
1824                geopdwd_filtered_cp.loc[:,'geometry']=geopdwd_filtered_cp['where'].map(locgeo)
1825                geopdwd_filtered_cp.loc[:,'geometry']=geopdwd_filtered_cp['geometry'].to_crs(crs="EPSG:4326")
1826                geopdwd_filtered_cp.loc[:,'clustername']=geopdwd_filtered_cp['where']
1827                geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered_cp
1828            else:
1829                geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd.loc[geopdwd.date == self.when_end]
1830                geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.reset_index(drop = True)
1831                geopdwd_filtered = gpd.GeoDataFrame(geopdwd_filtered, geometry=geopdwd_filtered.geometry, crs="EPSG:4326")
1832                geopdwd = geopdwd.sort_values(by=['clustername', 'date'], ascending = [True, False])
1833                geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.sort_values(by=['clustername', 'date'], ascending = [True, False]).drop(columns=['date', 'colors'])
1834                new_poly = []
1835                geolistmodified = dict()
1836
1837                for index, row in geopdwd_filtered.iterrows():
1838                    split_poly = []
1839                    new_poly = []
1840                    if row['geometry']:
1841                        for pt in self.get_polycoords(row):
1842                            if type(pt) == tuple:
1843                                new_poly.append(CocoDisplay.wgs84_to_web_mercator(pt))
1844                            elif type(pt) == list:
1845                                shifted = []
1846                                for p in pt:
1847                                    shifted.append(CocoDisplay.wgs84_to_web_mercator(p))
1848                                new_poly.append(sg.Polygon(shifted))
1849                            else:
1850                                raise CoaTypeError("Neither tuple or list don't know what to do with \
1851                                    your geometry description")
1852
1853                        if type(new_poly[0]) == tuple:
1854                            geolistmodified[row['where']] = sg.Polygon(new_poly)
1855                        else:
1856                            geolistmodified[row['where']] = sg.MultiPolygon(new_poly)
1857                ng = pd.DataFrame(geolistmodified.items(), columns=['where', 'geometry'])
1858                geolistmodified = gpd.GeoDataFrame({'where': ng['where'], 'geometry': gpd.GeoSeries(ng['geometry'])}, crs="epsg:3857")
1859                geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.drop(columns='geometry')
1860                geopdwd_filtered = pd.merge(geolistmodified, geopdwd_filtered, on='where')
1861                #if kwargs['wanted_dates']:
1862                #    kwargs.pop('wanted_dates')
1863
1864            return func(self, geopdwd, geopdwd_filtered, **kwargs)
1865        return innerdecopycoageo
@decowrapper
@decohistomap
@decopycoageo
def pycoageo(self, geopdwd, geopdwd_filtered, **kwargs): 
1868    @decowrapper
1869    @decohistomap
1870    @decopycoageo
1871    def pycoageo(self, geopdwd, geopdwd_filtered, **kwargs):
1872        return geopdwd
def decomap(func): 
1874    def decomap(func):
1875        @wraps(func)
1876        def innerdecomap(self, geopdwd, geopdwd_filtered, **kwargs):
1877            title = kwargs.get('title', None)
1878            maplabel = kwargs.get('maplabel',self.dvisu_default['maplabel'])
1879            tile =  kwargs.get('tile', None)
1880            if tile:
1881                tile = CocoDisplay.convert_tile(tile, 'bokeh')
1882            uniqloc = list(geopdwd_filtered.clustername.unique())
1883            dfLabel = pd.DataFrame()
1884            sourcemaplabel = ColumnDataSource(dfLabel)
1885            if maplabel or func.__name__ in ['pycoa_pimpmap','pycoa_map','pycoa_mapfolium']:
1886                locsum = geopdwd_filtered.clustername.unique()
1887                numberpercluster = geopdwd_filtered['clustername'].value_counts().to_dict()
1888                sumgeo = geopdwd_filtered.copy()
1889                if self.pycoageopandas == True:
1890                    sumgeo = sumgeo.to_crs(3035)
1891                else:
1892                    sumgeo['geometry'] = sumgeo['geometry'].buffer(0.001) #needed with geopandas 0.10.2
1893
1894                sumgeo.loc[:,'centroidx'] = sumgeo['geometry'].centroid.x
1895                sumgeo.loc[:,'centroidy'] = sumgeo['geometry'].centroid.y
1896                clust=sumgeo.clustername.unique()
1897
1898                centrosx = [sumgeo.loc[sumgeo.clustername==i]['centroidx'].mean() for i in clust]
1899                centrosy = [sumgeo.loc[sumgeo.clustername==i]['centroidy'].mean() for i in clust]
1900                sumgeo = sumgeo.dissolve(by='clustername', aggfunc='sum').reset_index()
1901                sumgeo['nb'] = sumgeo['clustername'].map(numberpercluster)
1902                cases = sumgeo['cases']/sumgeo['nb']
1903
1904                dfLabel=pd.DataFrame({'clustername':sumgeo.clustername,'centroidx':centrosx,'centroidy':centrosy,'cases':cases,'geometry':sumgeo['geometry']})
1905
1906                if maplabel:
1907                    if 'spark' in maplabel:
1908                        sparkos = {i: CocoDisplay.sparkline(geopdwd.loc[ (geopdwd.clustername==i) &
1909                                    (geopdwd.date >= self.when_beg) &
1910                                    (geopdwd.date <= self.when_end)].sort_values(by='date')['cases']) for i in locsum }
1911                        dfpimp = pd.DataFrame(list(sparkos.items()), columns=['clustername', 'pimpmap'])
1912                        dfLabel=pd.merge(dfLabel,dfpimp,on=['clustername'],how="inner")
1913                    if 'spiral' in maplabel:
1914                        sparkos = {i: CocoDisplay.spiral(geopdwd.loc[ (geopdwd.clustername==i) &
1915                                    (geopdwd.date >= self.when_beg) &
1916                                    (geopdwd.date <= self.when_end)].sort_values(by='date')[['date','cases','clustername']]) for i in locsum }
1917                        dfpimp = pd.DataFrame(list(sparkos.items()), columns=['clustername', 'pimpmap'])
1918                        dfLabel=pd.merge(dfLabel,dfpimp,on=['clustername'],how="inner")
1919
1920                dfLabel['cases'] = dfLabel['cases'].round(2)
1921                # Converting links to html tags
1922                if maplabel and 'label%' in maplabel:
1923                    dfLabel['cases'] = [str(round(float(i*100),2))+'%' for i in dfLabel['cases']]
1924                else:
1925                    dfLabel['cases']=[str(i) for i in dfLabel['cases']]
1926                sourcemaplabel = ColumnDataSource(dfLabel.drop(columns='geometry'))
1927            minx, miny, maxx, maxy =  geopdwd_filtered.total_bounds #self.boundary
1928
1929            kwargs['plot_width']=kwargs['plot_height']
1930            x_range=(minx,maxx)
1931            y_range=(miny,maxy)
1932            if func.__name__ == 'pycoa_pimpmap':
1933                standardfig = self.standardfig(x_range=x_range, y_range=y_range, x_axis_type="mercator", y_axis_type="mercator",**kwargs,match_aspect=True)
1934            else:
1935                standardfig = self.standardfig(x_axis_type="mercator", y_axis_type="mercator",**kwargs,match_aspect=True)
1936
1937            if tile:
1938                wmt = WMTSTileSource(
1939                            url=tile)
1940                standardfig.add_tile(wmt)
1941            else:
1942                standardfig.background_fill_color = "lightgrey"
1943
1944            geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered[['cases','geometry','where','clustername','codelocation','rolloverdisplay']]
1945            if not dfLabel.empty:
1946                geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.drop(columns = 'geometry')
1947                geopdwd_filtered = pd.merge(geopdwd_filtered, dfLabel[['clustername','geometry']], on = 'clustername')
1948                geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.drop_duplicates(subset = ['clustername'])
1949            if self.dbld[self.database_name][0] == 'BEL' :
1950                reorder = list(geopdwd_filtered['where'].unique())
1951                geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.set_index('where')
1952                geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.reindex(index = reorder)
1953                geopdwd_filtered = geopdwd_filtered.reset_index()
1954
1955            if self.dbld[self.database_name][0] == 'GBR' :
1956                geopdwd = geopdwd.loc[~geopdwd.cases.isnull()]
1957                geopdwd_filtered  = geopdwd_filtered.loc[~geopdwd_filtered.cases.isnull()]
1958            return func(self, geopdwd, geopdwd_filtered, sourcemaplabel, standardfig,**kwargs)
1959        return innerdecomap
@decowrapper
@decohistomap
@decopycoageo
@decomap
def pycoa_map( self, geopdwd, geopdwd_filtered, sourcemaplabel, standardfig, **kwargs): 
1962    @decowrapper
1963    @decohistomap
1964    @decopycoageo
1965    @decomap
1966    def pycoa_map(self, geopdwd, geopdwd_filtered, sourcemaplabel, standardfig,**kwargs):
1967        '''
1968            -----------------
1969            Create a map bokeh with arguments.
1970            See help(pycoa_histo).
1971            Keyword arguments
1972            -----------------
1973            - srcfiltered : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory
1974            |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
1975            - input_field = if None take second element could be a list
1976            - plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
1977            - plot_width = width_height_default[0]
1978            - title = None
1979            - textcopyright = default
1980            - mode = mouse
1981            - cursor_date = None if True
1982                    - orientation = horizontal
1983            - when : default min and max according to the inpude DataFrame.
1984                         Dates are given under the format dd/mm/yyyy.
1985                         when format [dd/mm/yyyy : dd/mm/yyyy]
1986                         if [:dd/mm/yyyy] min date up to
1987                         if [dd/mm/yyyy:] up to max date
1988            - tile : tile
1989            - maplabel: False
1990        '''
1991        date_slider = kwargs['date_slider']
1992        maplabel = kwargs.get('maplabel',self.dvisu_default['maplabel'])
1993        min_col, max_col, min_col_non0 = 3*[0.]
1994        try:
1995            if date_slider:
1996                min_col, max_col = CocoDisplay.min_max_range(np.nanmin(geopdwd['cases']),
1997                                                         np.nanmax(geopdwd['cases']))
1998                min_col_non0 = (np.nanmin(geopdwd.loc[geopdwd['cases']>0.]['cases']))
1999            else:
2000                min_col, max_col = CocoDisplay.min_max_range(np.nanmin(geopdwd_filtered['cases']),
2001                                                         np.nanmax(geopdwd_filtered['cases']))
2002                min_col_non0 = (np.nanmin(geopdwd_filtered.loc[geopdwd_filtered['cases']>0.]['cases']))
2003        except ValueError:  #raised if `geopdwd_filtered` is empty.
2004            pass
2005        #min_col, max_col = np.nanmin(geopdwd_filtered['cases']),np.nanmax(geopdwd_filtered['cases'])
2006
2007        json_data = json.dumps(json.loads(geopdwd_filtered.to_json()))
2008        geopdwd_filtered = GeoJSONDataSource(geojson=json_data)
2009
2010        invViridis256 = Viridis256[::-1]
2011        if maplabel and 'log' in maplabel:
2012            color_mapper = LogColorMapper(palette=invViridis256, low=min_col_non0, high=max_col, nan_color='#ffffff')
2013        else:
2014            color_mapper = LinearColorMapper(palette=invViridis256, low=min_col, high=max_col, nan_color='#ffffff')
2015        color_bar = ColorBar(color_mapper=color_mapper, label_standoff=4, bar_line_cap='round',
2016                             border_line_color=None, location=(0, 0), orientation='horizontal', ticker=BasicTicker())
2017        color_bar.formatter = BasicTickFormatter(use_scientific=True, precision=1, power_limit_low=int(max_col))
2018
2019        if maplabel and 'label%' in maplabel:
2020            color_bar.formatter = BasicTickFormatter(use_scientific=False)
2021            color_bar.formatter = NumeralTickFormatter(format="0.0%")
2022
2023        standardfig.add_layout(color_bar, 'below')
2024        standardfig.add_layout(Title(text=self.subtitle, text_font_size="8pt", text_font_style="italic"), 'below')
2025        if date_slider:
2026            allcases_location, allcases_dates = pd.DataFrame(), pd.DataFrame()
2027            allcases_location = geopdwd.groupby('where')['cases'].apply(list)
2028            geopdwd_tmp = geopdwd.drop_duplicates(subset = ['where']).drop(columns = 'cases')
2029            geopdwd_tmp = pd.merge(geopdwd_tmp, allcases_location, on = 'where')
2030            geopdwd_tmp  = geopdwd_tmp.drop_duplicates(subset = ['clustername'])
2031            geopdwd_tmp = ColumnDataSource(geopdwd_tmp.drop(columns=['geometry']))
2032
2033            sourcemaplabel.data['rolloverdisplay'] = sourcemaplabel.data['clustername']
2034
2035            callback = CustomJS(args =  dict(source = geopdwd_tmp, source_filter = geopdwd_filtered,
2036                                          date_sliderjs = date_slider, title=standardfig.title,
2037                                          color_mapperjs = color_mapper, maplabeljs = sourcemaplabel),
2038                        code = """
2039                        var ind_date_max = (date_sliderjs.end-date_sliderjs.start)/(24*3600*1000);
2040                        var ind_date = (date_sliderjs.value-date_sliderjs.start)/(24*3600*1000);
2041                        var new_cases = [];
2042                        var dict = {};
2043                        var iloop = source_filter.data['clustername'].length;
2044
2045                        function form(value) {
2046                             if(value>10000 || value <0.01)
2047                                value =  Number.parseFloat(value).toExponential(2);
2048                             else
2049                                 value = Number.parseFloat(value).toFixed(2);
2050                            return value;
2051                         }
2052                        for (var i = 0; i < source.get_length(); i++)
2053                        {
2054                                var val=form(source.data['cases'][i][ind_date_max-ind_date]);
2055                                new_cases.push(val);
2056                        }
2057                        if(source.get_length() == 1 && iloop>1)
2058                            for(var i = 0; i < iloop; i++)
2059                                for(var j = 0; j < new_cases.length; j++){
2060                                source_filter.data['cases'][i][j] = new_cases[j];
2061                                }
2062                        else{
2063                            source_filter.data['cases'] = new_cases;
2064                            }
2065
2066                        if (maplabeljs.get_length() !== 0){
2067                            maplabeljs.data['cases'] = source_filter.data['cases'];
2068                            }
2069                        for (var i = 0; i < maplabeljs.get_length(); i++)
2070                        {
2071                            maplabeljs.data['cases'][i] = form(maplabeljs.data['cases'][i]).toString();
2072                            maplabeljs.data['rolloverdisplay'][i] = source_filter.data['rolloverdisplay'][i];
2073                        }
2074
2075                        var tmp = title.text;
2076                        tmp = tmp.slice(0, -11);
2077                        var dateconverted = new Date(date_sliderjs.value);
2078                        var dd = String(dateconverted.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
2079                        var mm = String(dateconverted.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); //January is 0!
2080                        var yyyy = dateconverted.getFullYear();
2081                        var dmy = dd + '/' + mm + '/' + yyyy;
2082                        title.text = tmp + dmy+")";
2083
2084                        if (maplabeljs.get_length() !== 0)
2085                            maplabeljs.change.emit();
2086
2087                        color_mapperjs.high=Math.max.apply(Math, new_cases);
2088                        color_mapperjs.low=Math.min.apply(Math, new_cases);
2089                        console.log(maplabeljs.data['cases']);
2090                        source_filter.change.emit();
2091                    """)
2092            date_slider.js_on_change('value', callback)
2093            # Set up Play/Pause button/toggle JS
2094            date_list = pd.date_range(geopdwd.date.min(),geopdwd.date.max()-dt.timedelta(days=1),freq='d').to_list()
2095            indexCDS = ColumnDataSource(dict(date=date_list))
2096            toggl_js = CustomJS(args=dict(date_slider=date_slider,indexCDS=indexCDS),code="""
2097            // A little lengthy but it works for me, for this problem, in this version.
2098                var check_and_iterate = function(date){
2099                    var slider_val = date_slider.value;
2100                    var toggle_val = cb_obj.active;
2101                    if(toggle_val == false) {
2102                        cb_obj.label = '► Play';
2103                        clearInterval(looop);
2104                        }
2105                    else if(slider_val == date[date.length - 1]) {
2106                        cb_obj.label = '► Play';
2107                        //date_slider.value = date[0];
2108                        cb_obj.active = false;
2109                        clearInterval(looop);
2110                        }
2111                    else if(slider_val !== date[date.length - 1]){
2112                        date_slider.value = date.filter((item) => item > slider_val)[0];
2113                        }
2114                    else {
2115                    clearInterval(looop);
2116                        }
2117                }
2118                if(cb_obj.active == false){
2119                    cb_obj.label = '► Play';
2120                    clearInterval(looop);
2121                }
2122                else {
2123                    cb_obj.label = '❚❚ Pause';
2124                    var looop = setInterval(check_and_iterate, 10, indexCDS.data['date']);
2125                };
2126            """)
2127
2128            toggl = Toggle(label='► Play',active=False, button_type="success",height=30,width=10)
2129            toggl.js_on_change('active',toggl_js)
2130
2131
2132        standardfig.xaxis.visible = False
2133        standardfig.yaxis.visible = False
2134        standardfig.xgrid.grid_line_color = None
2135        standardfig.ygrid.grid_line_color = None
2136        standardfig.patches('xs', 'ys', source = geopdwd_filtered,
2137                            fill_color = {'field': 'cases', 'transform': color_mapper},
2138                            line_color = 'black', line_width = 0.25, fill_alpha = 1)
2139        if maplabel:
2140            if 'text' in maplabel or 'textinteger' in maplabel:
2141
2142                if 'textinteger' in maplabel:
2143                    sourcemaplabel.data['cases'] = sourcemaplabel.data['cases'].astype(float).astype(int).astype(str)
2144                labels = LabelSet(
2145                    x = 'centroidx',
2146                    y = 'centroidy',
2147                    text = 'cases',
2148                    source = sourcemaplabel, text_font_size='10px',text_color='white',background_fill_color='grey',background_fill_alpha=0.5)
2149                standardfig.add_layout(labels)
2150
2151        #cases_custom = CocoDisplay.rollerJS()
2152        callback = CustomJS(code="""
2153        //document.getElementsByClassName('bk-tooltip')[0].style.backgroundColor="transparent";
2154        document.getElementsByClassName('bk-tooltip')[0].style.opacity="0.7";
2155        """ )
2156        tooltips = """
2157                    <b>location: @rolloverdisplay<br>
2158                    cases: @cases{0,0.0} </b>
2159                    """
2160
2161        standardfig.add_tools(HoverTool(tooltips = tooltips,
2162        formatters = {'where': 'printf', 'cases': 'printf',},
2163        point_policy = "snap_to_data",callback=callback))  # ,PanTool())
2164        if date_slider:
2165            standardfig = column(date_slider, standardfig,toggl)
2166        self.pycoageopandas = False
2167        return standardfig

Create a map bokeh with arguments. See help(pycoa_histo).

Keyword arguments

  • srcfiltered : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
  • input_field = if None take second element could be a list
  • plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
  • plot_width = width_height_default[0]
  • title = None
  • textcopyright = default
  • mode = mouse
  • cursor_date = None if True
    • orientation = horizontal
  • when : default min and max according to the inpude DataFrame. Dates are given under the format dd/mm/yyyy. when format [dd/mm/yyyy : dd/mm/yyyy] if [:dd/mm/yyyy] min date up to if [dd/mm/yyyy:] up to max date
  • tile : tile
  • maplabel: False
@decowrapper
@decohistomap
@decopycoageo
@decomap
def pycoa_pimpmap( self, geopdwd, geopdwd_filtered, sourcemaplabel, standardfig, **kwargs): 
2170    @decowrapper
2171    @decohistomap
2172    @decopycoageo
2173    @decomap
2174    def pycoa_pimpmap(self, geopdwd, geopdwd_filtered, sourcemaplabel, standardfig,**kwargs):
2175        '''
2176            -----------------
2177            Create a bokeh map with pimpline label and with to arguments.
2178            See help(pycoa_histo).
2179            Keyword arguments
2180            -----------------
2181            - srcfiltered : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory
2182            |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
2183            - input_field = if None take second element could be a list
2184            - plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
2185            - plot_width = width_height_default[0]
2186            - title = None
2187            - textcopyright = default
2188            - mode = mouse
2189            - cursor_date = None if True
2190                    - orientation = horizontal
2191            - when : default min and max according to the inpude DataFrame.
2192                         Dates are given under the format dd/mm/yyyy.
2193                         when format [dd/mm/yyyy : dd/mm/yyyy]
2194                         if [:dd/mm/yyyy] min date up to
2195                         if [dd/mm/yyyy:] up to max date
2196            - tile : tile
2197            - maplabel: False
2198        '''
2199        standardfig.xaxis.visible = False
2200        standardfig.yaxis.visible = False
2201        standardfig.xgrid.grid_line_color = None
2202        standardfig.ygrid.grid_line_color = None
2203
2204        min_col, max_col = CocoDisplay.min_max_range(np.nanmin(geopdwd_filtered['cases']),
2205                                                     np.nanmax(geopdwd_filtered['cases']))
2206
2207        json_data = json.dumps(json.loads(geopdwd_filtered.to_json()))
2208        geopdwd_filtered = GeoJSONDataSource(geojson=json_data)
2209
2210        invViridis256 = Viridis256[::-1]
2211        color_mapper = LinearColorMapper(palette=invViridis256, low=min_col, high=max_col, nan_color='#ffffff')
2212        color_bar = ColorBar(color_mapper=color_mapper, label_standoff=4,
2213                             border_line_color=None, location=(0, 0), orientation='horizontal', ticker=BasicTicker())
2214        color_bar.formatter = BasicTickFormatter(use_scientific=True, precision=1, power_limit_low=int(max_col))
2215        standardfig.add_layout(color_bar, 'below')
2216        standardfig.patches('xs', 'ys', source = geopdwd_filtered,
2217                                    fill_color = {'field': 'cases', 'transform': color_mapper},
2218                                    line_color = 'black', line_width = 0.25, fill_alpha = 1)
2219        standardfig.image_url(url='pimpmap', x='centroidx', y='centroidy',source=sourcemaplabel,anchor="center")
2220        return standardfig

Create a bokeh map with pimpline label and with to arguments. See help(pycoa_histo).

Keyword arguments

  • srcfiltered : A DataFrame with a Pycoa struture is mandatory |location|date|Variable desired|daily|cumul|weekly|codelocation|clustername|permanentdisplay|rolloverdisplay|
  • input_field = if None take second element could be a list
  • plot_heigh= width_height_default[1]
  • plot_width = width_height_default[0]
  • title = None
  • textcopyright = default
  • mode = mouse
  • cursor_date = None if True
    • orientation = horizontal
  • when : default min and max according to the inpude DataFrame. Dates are given under the format dd/mm/yyyy. when format [dd/mm/yyyy : dd/mm/yyyy] if [:dd/mm/yyyy] min date up to if [dd/mm/yyyy:] up to max date
  • tile : tile
  • maplabel: False
def tiles_list(self): 
2222    def tiles_list(self):
2223        return self.available_tiles
@staticmethod
def convert_tile(tilename, which='bokeh'): 
2225    @staticmethod
2226    def convert_tile(tilename, which = 'bokeh'):
2227        ''' Return tiles url according to folium or bokeh resquested'''
2228        tile = 'openstreet'
2229        if tilename == 'openstreet':
2230            if which == 'folium':
2231                tile = r'https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png'
2232            else:
2233                tile = r'http://c.tile.openstreetmap.org/{Z}/{X}/{Y}.png'
2234        elif tilename == 'positron':
2235            print('Problem with positron tile (huge http resquest need to check), esri is then used ...')
2236            tile = r'https://server.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/World_Imagery/MapServer/tile/{z}/{y}/{x}.png'
2237        #    tile = 'https://tiles.basemaps.cartocdn.com/light_all/{z}/{x}/{y}.png'
2238        elif tilename == 'esri':
2239            tile = r'https://server.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/World_Imagery/MapServer/tile/{z}/{y}/{x}.png'
2240        elif tilename == 'stamen':
2241            tile = r'http://tile.stamen.com/toner/{z}/{x}/{y}.png'
2242        else:
2243            print('Don\'t know you tile ... take default one: ')
2244        return tile

Return tiles url according to folium or bokeh resquested

@staticmethod
def dict_shorten_loc(toshort): 
2246    @staticmethod
2247    def dict_shorten_loc(toshort):
2248        '''
2249            return a shorten name location
2250        '''
2251        s = []
2252        if type(toshort) == np.ndarray:
2253            toshort = list(toshort)
2254            toshort = [toshort]
2255            s = ''
2256        elif type(toshort) == str:
2257            toshort = [toshort]
2258            s = ''
2259        #if type(toshort) != list:
2260        #    print('That is weird ...', toshort, 'not str nor list')
2261        for val in toshort:
2262            if not isinstance(val,str):
2263                val= str(val)
2264            if type(val) == list:
2265                val = val[0]
2266            if val.find(',') == -1:
2267                A = val
2268            else:
2269                txt = val.split(',')
2270                if len(txt[0]) < 4 and len(txt[-1]) < 4:
2271                    A = [txt[0] + '...' + txt[-1]]
2272                else:
2273                    A = txt[0][:5] + '...' + txt[-1][-5:]
2274            if type(s) == list:
2275                s.append(A)
2276            else:
2277                s = A
2278            if isinstance(s, list):
2279                s=s[0]
2280        return s

return a shorten name location

@staticmethod
def bokeh_legend(bkfigure): 
2282    @staticmethod
2283    def bokeh_legend(bkfigure):
2284        toggle_legend_js = CustomJS(args=dict(leg=bkfigure.legend[0]),
2285                                    code="""
2286        if(leg.visible)
2287        {
2288            leg.visible = false;
2289        }
2290        else
2291        {
2292            leg.visible = true;
2293        }
2294        """)
2295        bkfigure.js_on_event(events.DoubleTap, toggle_legend_js)
@staticmethod
def min_max_range(a_min, a_max): 
2297    @staticmethod
2298    def min_max_range(a_min, a_max):
2299        """ Return a cleverly rounded min and max giving raw min and raw max of data.
2300        Usefull for hist range and colormap
2301        """
2302        min_p = 0
2303        max_p = 0
2304        if a_min != 0:
2305            min_p = math.floor(math.log10(math.fabs(a_min)))  # power
2306        if a_max != 0:
2307            max_p = math.floor(math.log10(math.fabs(a_max)))
2308
2309        if a_min == 0:
2310            if a_max == 0:
2311                p = 0
2312            else:
2313                p = max_p
2314        else:
2315            if a_max == 0:
2316                p = min_p
2317            else:
2318                p = max(min_p, max_p)
2319
2320        if a_min != 0:
2321            min_r = math.floor(a_min / 10 ** (p - 1)) * 10 ** (p - 1)  # min range rounded
2322        else:
2323            min_r = 0
2324
2325        if a_max != 0:
2326            max_r = math.ceil(a_max / 10 ** (p - 1)) * 10 ** (p - 1)
2327        else:
2328            max_r = 0
2329
2330        if min_r == max_r:
2331            if min_r == 0:
2332                min_r = -1
2333                max_r = 1
2334                k = 0
2335            elif max_r > 0:
2336                k = 0.1
2337            else:
2338                k = -0.1
2339            max_r = (1 + k) * max_r
2340            min_r = (1 - k) * min_r
2341
2342        return (min_r, max_r)

Return a cleverly rounded min and max giving raw min and raw max of data. Usefull for hist range and colormap

@staticmethod
def save_map2png(map=None, pngfile='map.png'): 
2344    @staticmethod
2345    def save_map2png(map=None, pngfile='map.png'):
2346        """
2347        Save map as png geckodriver and PIL packages are needed
2348        """
2349        size = width_height_default[0], width_height_default[1]
2350        if pngfile:
2351            pngfile = pngfile
2352        img_data = map._to_png(5)
2353        img = Image.open(io.BytesIO(img_data))
2354        img.thumbnail(size, Image.ANTIALIAS)
2355        img.save(pngfile)
2356        print(pngfile, ' is now save ...')

Save map as png geckodriver and PIL packages are needed

@staticmethod
def save_pandas_as_png(df=None, pngfile='pandas.png'): 
2358    @staticmethod
2359    def save_pandas_as_png(df=None, pngfile='pandas.png'):
2360        source = ColumnDataSource(df)
2361        df_columns = [df.index.name]
2362        df_columns.extend(df.columns.values)
2363        columns_for_table = []
2364        for column in df_columns:
2365            if column is not None:
2366                columns_for_table.append(TableColumn(field=column, title=column))
2367                # width_height_default
2368        data_table = DataTable(source=source, columns=columns_for_table,
2369                               height_policy="auto", width_policy="auto", index_position=None)
2370        export_png(data_table, filename=pngfile)
@staticmethod
def changeto_nonan_date(df=None, when_end=None, field=None): 
2372    @staticmethod
2373    def changeto_nonan_date(df=None, when_end=None, field=None):
2374        if not isinstance(when_end, dt.date):
